title: 100% (A Hundred Percents)
synopsis: A pretty 22-year-old girl leaves university and gets her dream job as a TV newscaster, only to discover that life is tough at the top. Adaptation of the "Young Action" manga by Michio Yanagisawa.
staff: [['Matsumoto, Yoshihisa', ['Director']], ['Takami, Akio', ['Animation Director']], ['Iimura, Kazuo', ['Character Design']], ['Jizoumoto, Takuji', ['Art Director']]]
